abilities.name: Beating Wings
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), If Pidgeot is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it in your deck. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sharp Beak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.
